keyMoments.title: Orders Suicide Torpedo Attack
keyMoments.description: Shuzo orders his Neo Marine subordinates to launch themselves as human torpedoes, demonstrating his ruthless and fanatical leadership.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the extreme devotion demanded by the Neo Marines and Shuzo's willingness to sacrifice his own men.
keyMoments.quote: Men! Launch yourselves as torpedoes! Sacrifice everything for our mission!

keyMoments.title: Battles Luffy with Full Power
keyMoments.description: Shuzo engages Luffy in an intense battle, utilizing his complete arsenal of Rokushiki techniques and Armament Haki to match the Straw Hat captain.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Shuzo's formidable combat abilities as someone trained by the legendary Z.
keyMoments.quote: I was trained by Z himself! Your rubber powers won't work on my Tekkai!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Gomu Gomu no Giant Jet Lance
keyMoments.description: Shuzo is overwhelmed and knocked unconscious by Luffy's combination attack with Lily, bringing an end to his campaign.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the conclusion of Shuzo's role in the Z's Ambition Arc and leads to his imprisonment.

statusHistory.reason: Captured by Vice Admiral Momonga and sent to Impel Down after defeat

abilities.description: An advanced variation of Shigan that strikes with five simultaneous finger thrusts.
An even more advanced variation of Shigan that strikes with ten simultaneous finger thrusts.
A unique Tekkai technique where Shuzo uses his Longarm anatomy to spin his hardened arms like flails, creating a devastating rotating attack.
Shuzo demonstrates proficiency in Armament Haki, allowing him to match Luffy's Haki-enhanced attacks and defend against Gear 2.

relationships.description: Shuzo was trained by Z when both were in the Marines, and followed him after Z's defection to form the Neo Marines.
Shuzo lost a five-hour tournament to Ain for the position of Z's second-in-command, creating a rivalry between them.
Shuzo battles Luffy as the main antagonist of the Z's Ambition Arc.

evolutionMoments.description: Final battle between Shuzo and Luffy ends with Shuzo's defeat.

reveals.information: Demonstrates Shigan Five and Shigan Ten variations
Shows Tekkai Three-Section Lariat technique utilizing Longarm physiology
Captured and sent to Impel Down after defeat

name.japanese: リリー・エンストマック

keyMoments.title: Enters Luffy and Enlarges Him
keyMoments.description: Lily uses her Mini Mini no Mi to shrink down and enter Luffy's body, then enlarges to turn him into a giant while retaining his abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a unique combination attack that demonstrates creative Devil Fruit synergy and turns the tide of battle.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy! Let me inside! I'll make you big enough to crush them!

keyMoments.title: Enables Gomu Gomu no Giant Jet Lance
keyMoments.description: By enlarging inside Luffy, Lily enables him to perform the devastating Gomu Gomu no Giant Jet Lance technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Lily's tactical thinking and willingness to trust Luffy completely, resulting in victory.

abilities.description: Lily shrinks to microscopic size, enters another person's body, then enlarges to turn them into a giant while maintaining their abilities.

relationships.description: Lily is the daughter of Panz Fry, the giant chef.
Lily teams up with Luffy to defeat Shuzo, showing complete trust by entering his body.

evolutionMoments.description: Lily and Luffy perform a combination attack, showing deep trust and teamwork.

reveals.information: Can enter other people's bodies at microscopic size and enlarge inside them

keyMoments.title: Prepares Feast for the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Panz Fry demonstrates his legendary Volcano Cooking skills by preparing an extraordinary feast for the Straw Hats as thanks for rescuing him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows gratitude and highlights the importance of food and celebration in One Piece's themes.

abilities.description: A special cooking technique that uses magma heat to create extraordinary dishes.

relationships.description: Panz Fry is the father of Lily Enstomach.
Panz Fry is grateful to Luffy and the Straw Hats for rescuing him from the Neo Marines.

keyMoments.title: Fires Haki-Enhanced Cannonballs
keyMoments.description: Alpacacino demonstrates the ability to fire cannonballs imbued with Armament Haki, successfully damaging Luffy's rubber body.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms that even Devil Fruit weapon-users can utilize Haki, making them dangerous to Devil Fruit users.

statusHistory.reason: Captured along with Shuzo after their defeat

abilities.description: Alpacacino fires cannonballs from his mouth that are imbued with Armament Haki, allowing them to damage Devil Fruit users.

relationships.description: Alpacacino serves as Shuzo's weapon and loyal companion.

reveals.information: Confirmed to be capable of using Armament Haki on projectiles
Confirmed as a bazooka that consumed a Zoan Devil Fruit

keyMoments.title: Reports Shuzo's Defeat to Z
keyMoments.description: Ain contacts Z to inform him of Shuzo's defeat and capture, receiving orders to proceed with the New World assault plan.
keyMoments.significance: Transitions the arc into the setup for One Piece Film Z and confirms the Neo Marines' larger agenda.
keyMoments.quote: Z-sensei, Shuzo has been defeated and captured. What are your orders?

relationships.description: Ain serves as Z's second-in-command and was trained by him.
Ain defeated Shuzo in a tournament for the position of Z's second-in-command.

keyMoments.title: Declares Continuation of New World Plan
keyMoments.description: Despite Shuzo's defeat, Z declares that the Neo Marines will proceed with their plan to eliminate all pirates from the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the events of One Piece Film Z and establishes Z's unwavering determination.
keyMoments.quote: Continue as planned. One loss won't stop our mission to eliminate all pirates from the New World.

relationships.description: Z trained Ain and made her his second-in-command.
Z trained Shuzo when both were in the Marines.

reveals.information: Plans to proceed with assault on the New World to eliminate all pirates
